message: The door is locked with an access panel.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I don't think our IDs are going to do us any good here."

name: 紅雀
message: "Wouldn't think so. How about we just smash our way in?"

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba, another message."
Ren pokes his head out of my bag.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Who's messaging me now? ...Wait. What?"
I try to ignore the message, but my Coil activates on its own and floods the screen with notifications.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ren, what's going on?"

name: 蓮
message: "An unknown process is running."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What the hell?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "The key to your heart?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Huh?"
Suddenly, the door in front of us opens.

name: 紅雀
message: "It just opened. Is it broken?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "That message I just got said something about the 'key to your heart'..."

name: 紅雀
message: "I dunno what that's got to do with anything, but an open door's an open door."
Koujaku glances back at his guys.

name: 紅雀メンバーＡ
message: "Take the elevator and head for the top floor! We'll be right behind you!"
One of them has a guard pinned. He lifts a hand and waves us on.
Koujaku nods back, then we run through the door together.
